articles.title: Canada to return repaired Nord Stream 1 turbine, expand sanctions on Russia - Reuters.com
articles.description: Canada will return a repaired turbine to Germany that is needed for the Nord Stream 1 gas pipeline and could help to ensure continued flows of energy until Europe can end its dependency on Russian gas, Canada's minister of natural resources said.
articles.content: OTTAWA/FRANKFURT, July 10 (Reuters) - Canada will return a repaired turbine to Germany that is needed for the Nord Stream 1 gas pipeline and could help to ensure continued flows of energy until Europ… [+2366 chars]

articles.title: Shahid Kapoor roasts Mira Rajput over makeup post: Didn’t wait to leave bathroom - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Shahid Kapoor joked about Mira Rajput's latest post about her makeup. Earlier, she gave a peek at Shahid playing with Misha during their Europe tour. Check out the posts here.
articles.content: Actor Shahid Kapoor roasted his wife Mira Rajput over her latest post on makeup. Taking to Instagram on Sunday, Mira shared a selfie as she posed inside a bathroom. She wrote, "#nofilter makeup by me… [+2281 chars]

articles.title: Adding salt to foods at the table increases risk of premature death - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: People who add extra salt to their food at the table are at higher risk of dying prematurely from any cause, according to a study of more than 500,000 people, published in the European Heart Journal today (Monday).
articles.content: People who add extra salt to their food at the table are at higher risk of dying prematurely from any cause, according to a study of more than 500,000 people, published in the European Heart Journal … [+6662 chars]
